mapper.select: SELECT tc.third_cate_id AS thirdCateId, tc.cate_name AS thirdCateName, sc.second_cate_id AS secondCateId, sc.cate_name AS secondCateName, fc.first_cate_id AS firstCateId, fc.cate_name AS firstCateName FROM public.third_cate AS tc JOIN public.second_cate AS sc ON tc.second_cate_id = sc.second_cate_id JOIN public.first_cate AS fc ON sc.first_cate_id = fc.first_cate_id
